descriptionNullable: EVJVQA, the first multilingual Visual Question Answering dataset with three languages: English, Vietnamese, and Japanese, is released in this task. UIT-EVJVQA includes question-answer pairs created by humans on a set of images taken in Vietnam, with the answer created from the input question and the corresponding image. EVJVQA consists of 33,000+ question-answer pairs for evaluating the mQA models.
title: EVJVQA
description: EVJVQA, the first multilingual Visual Question Answering dataset with three languages: English, Vietnamese, and Japanese, is released in this task. UIT-EVJVQA includes question-answer pairs created by humans on a set of images taken in Vietnam, with the answer created from the input question and the corresponding image. EVJVQA consists of 33,000+ question-answer pairs for evaluating the mQA models.
